thread.title: Luca Guadagnino apologizes to 'Call Me By Your Name' fans

title: Luca Guadagnino apologizes to 'Call Me By Your Name' fans
text:
Luca Guadagnino apologizes to 'Call Me By Your Name' fans 2:08am GMT - 01:38 
Since it was launched at Sundance in 2017, 'Call Me By Your Name' has received glowing reviews and has become one of the most prominent films during awards season with four Oscar nominations. The
